sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-switch
        v-model="toKorean"
        hide-details
        inset
        :label="switchLabel"
    ></v-switch>
    <v-textarea
        clearable
        clear-icon="mdi-trash-can-outline"
        auto-grow
        label="한/영타 변환기"
        v-model="inputText"
    ></v-textarea>
    {{convertInputText}}
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from "vue";
// Components

export default defineComponent({
  name: "HomeView",

  data: () => ({
    toKorean: true,
    inputText: "",
    HANGUL_START: 0xAC00,
    HANGUL_END: 0xD7A3,
    HANGUL_BASE: this.HANGUL_END - this.HANGUL_START + 1,
    HANGUL_CHOSUNG: ["ㄱ", "ㄲ", "ㄴ", "ㄷ", "ㄸ", "ㄹ", "ㅁ", "ㅂ", "ㅃ", "ㅅ", "ㅆ", "ㅇ", "ㅈ", "ㅉ", "ㅊ", "ㅋ", "ㅌ", "ㅍ", "ㅎ"],
    HANGUL_JUNGSUNG: ["ㅏ", "ㅐ", "ㅑ", "ㅒ", "ㅓ", "ㅔ", "ㅕ", "ㅖ", "ㅗ", "ㅘ", "ㅙ", "ㅚ", "ㅛ", "ㅜ", "ㅝ", "ㅞ", "ㅟ", "ㅠ", "ㅡ", "ㅢ", "ㅣ"],
    HANGUL_JONGSUNG: ["", "ㄱ", "ㄲ", "ㄳ", "ㄴ", "ㄵ", "ㄶ", "ㄷ", "ㄹ", "ㄺ", "ㄻ", "ㄼ", "ㄽ", "ㄾ", "ㄿ", "ㅀ", "ㅁ", "ㅂ", "ㅄ", "ㅅ", "ㅆ", "ㅇ", "ㅈ", "ㅊ", "ㅋ", "ㅌ", "ㅍ", "ㅎ"],
  }),

  computed: {
    convertInputText() {
      let result = "";
      for (let i = 0; i < this.inputText.length; i++) {
        result += this.toEnglish(this.inputText[i]);
      }
      return result
    },
    switchLabel(){
      if (this.toKorean) return "영어를 한글로"
      return "한글을 영어로"
    }
  },

  methods: {
    toEnglish(ch) {;
      let code = ch.charCodeAt(0);

      if (code < this.HANGUL_START || code > this.HANGUL_END) {
        return ch;
      }

      let cho = this.HANGUL_CHOSUNG[Math.floor((code - this.HANGUL_START) / this.HANGUL_BASE / 21)];
      let jung = this.HANGUL_JUNGSUNG[Math.floor((code - this.HANGUL_START) / this.HANGUL_BASE) % 21];
      let jong = this.HANGUL_JONGSUNG[(code - this.HANGUL_START) % 28];

      return cho + jung + jong;
    }
  },
});
</script>
<style scoped>
@font-face {
  font-family: 'LINESeedKR-Bd';
  src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/projectnoonnu/noonfonts_11-01@1.0/LINESeedKR-Bd.woff2') format('woff2');
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: normal;
}

* {
  font-family: 'LINESeedKR-Bd';
}
</style>
